content: The process for exporting from the Advanced Mode tab is largely the same as Simple Mode, but with a few wrinkles. First you should choose your Panda installation directory and Maya version from the Environment Options section. This location is the directory where you told Panda3D to install when running the installer. It is NOT the \bin directory where the maya2egg executable resides. This little wrinkle was necessary to allow multiple operating systems to use the application.
